__e: I've already mourned the loss of my mother and that broken family, and now I have a new family that will love and support me in a way that, unfortunately, my biological mother never could.
And the other is a broken down family man, with nothing... nothing to show for his life.
We need to know how our security has been breached, and you're the only one who can find out.
And always remember the sword we have although it looks complete It's just as if it's broken into two pieces
Whatever life I had is gone... shattered into a million tiny pieces.
Or is it really just for you? Are you just trying to fix something that's broken in you?
